abstract: City Council is considering legislation that would double number of food vendor permits issued in New York City over next seven years, granting permits to 600 addition vendors each year; number of vendor permits has held steady at around 4,235 since 1980s, forcing many vendors to turn to black market.
lead_paragraph: The City Council intends to consider legislation that would gradually increase the number of permits issued over the course of seven years.
snippet: The City Council intends to consider legislation that would gradually increase the number of permits issued over the course of seven years....

headline.main: New York City May Double Number of Food Vendor Permits
headline.print_headline: New York’s Moveable Feast Might Grow Even Larger
